post.image_prompt: A close-up, high-resolution shot showcasing a variety of MAC lipsticks. The lipsticks are arranged artfully on a reflective, slightly blurred surface that catches the light, creating a soft, diffused glow. The lipsticks are in a range of shades, from classic reds and nudes to bolder pinks and plums. The focus is sharpest on the lipstick bullets, highlighting their textures and colors. The style is modern and sophisticated, reflecting the MAC brand aesthetic. The image should evoke feelings of confidence, beauty, and self-expression. There should be a slight depth of field, blurring the background and emphasizing the lipsticks in the foreground. The image should be suitable for both Instagram feed and story formats.
